author: Ohn Richelieu Cruz
description: "This drink was actually inspired by the man himself who founded Bacard√≠: Don Facundo Bacardi Masso. As I researched into him, a very clear picture of him formed in my mind. He is the epitome of the ultimate sales man; one that has passion, confidence, motivation and who values family. "I dedicate this cocktail to my father Roberto Cruz who reminds me so much of Don Facundo; it also honours all bartenders who possess the same qualities as Don Facundo. El Tindero is best served as an after dinner drink."We say: Strangely reminiscent of a 'lager shandy' with very subdued coconut notes. It's a very tasty lager shandy though.
name: El Tindero
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)
